definitions.definition: strictness (in interpreting or enforcing a rule) (Can we add an example for this sense?)
In Roman Catholic moral theology, the doctrine that in a case of doubt between right and wrong one should take the safer course, i.e. the one in verbal accordance with the law.

main_definition: strictness (in interpreting or enforcing a rule) (Can we add an example for this sense?)
